import React, { useState } from 'react' import ClientDetails from './ClientDetails' import Header from './Header' import Dates from './Dates' import Job from './Job' import Footer from './Footer' import Developer from './Developer' import Table from './Table.js' import '../css/App.css' import TableForm from './TableForm' function Invoice({dev}) { const [showInvoice, setShowInvoice] = useState(false) // const [name, setName] = useState('Elon Musks') const [address, setAddress] = useState('Nairobi') const [email, setEmail] = useState('elon@gmail.com') const [phone, setPhone] = useState('-8889-98-87777') const [github, setGithub] = useState("htttps//spacex.com") const [bankName, setBankName] = useState('KCB') const [bankAccount, setBankAccount] = useState('34567754') const [clientName, setClientName] = useState('John Doe') const [clientAddress, setClientAddress] = useState('Kisumu') const [invoiceNumber, setInvoiceNumber] = useState('1234562') const [invoiceDate, setInvoiceDate] = useState('22/10/2022') const [dueDate, setDueDate] = useState('30/11/2022') const [job, setJob] = useState('Awesome') const [description, setDescription] = useState("") const [rate, setRate] = useState("") const [price, setPrice] = useState("") const [amount, setAmount] = useState("") const handlePrint = () => { window.print() } return ( <>
{ showInvoice ? (
< Table description={description} rate={rate} price={price} amount={amount} />
) : ( <>
setEmail(e.target.value)} />
setGithub(e.target.value)} />
setPhone(e.target.value)} />
setBankName(e.target.value)} />
setBankAccount(e.target.value)} />
setClientName(e.target.value)} />
setClientAddress(e.target.value)} />
setInvoiceNumber(e.target.value)} />
setInvoiceDate(e.target.value)} />
setDueDate(e.target.value)} />
)}
) } export default Invoice
